value.title: South Korea suspends visas for Japanese in tit-for-tat coronavirus curbs
value.excerpt: South Korea said on Friday it would suspend visas and visa waivers for Japan in response to Tokyo’s own travel restrictions on Koreans, as fears over the spreading coronavirus rekindled a feud between the neighbors dating back to before World War Two.

value.excerpt: Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom have postponed their upcoming nuptials in Japan, according to multiple reports.
